Name: SIGURAT
About the game: For people who lack the qualifications to exercise free will Bring a friend to fight alongside you using the same keyboard, even using remote play! Pilot more than 10 different ships each with their own combination of weapon, ability, passive, and look! Earn credits at the end of each session and spend them on new ships! Explore four different sectors, each with their own unique enemies! Find ship black boxes to uncover secrets!
